title: FedEX 貨機香港起飛後疑偏離航道飛近大帽山

replies.msg:
美國聯邦快遞一架貨機昨日從香港起飛後，懷疑偏離航道飛行。

事件涉及飛往台北的聯邦快遞貨機FX14。根據網上航空雷達紀錄網站資料，該架聯邦快遞貨機星期三下午4時多從香港機場起飛，向東北方向飛行，左轉飛向屯門黃金海岸按，再飛向大帽山方向，沒有按照正常航道飛到馬灣右轉。報道指，在管制員多次提示後，飛機才返回正常航線，加快爬升至超過4300呎。

quote.msg:

Incident: Asiana B744 at Hong Kong on Apr 1st 2020, descended to about 800 feet AGL about 4.6nm before runway
By Simon Hradecky, created Thursday, Apr 2nd 2020 20:28Z, last updated Thursday, Apr 2nd 2020 20:41Z

An Asiana Airlines Boeing 747-400 freighter, registration HL7420 performing flight OZ-952 from Hanoi (Vietnam) to Hong Kong (China), performed an ILS approach to Hong Kong's runway 07R at about 06:25L (22:25Z Mar 31st), approach advised the crew to be aware of possible glideslope fluctuations due to an aircraft in the sensitive area. However, the aircraft descended to about 800 feet AGL about 4.6nm before the runway threshold. Tower instructed the flight to go around, the crew complied, climbed the aircraft to 5000 feet and positioned for a second approach to runway 07R, crossed 4.6nm before the threshold at about 1600 feet AGL and landed safely about 15 minutes after the go around.

Approach Control again told the next arrival to exercise caution due to glideslope fluctuations due to an aircraft in the sensitive area.

Incident: Asiana B744 at Hong Kong on Apr 1st 2020, descended to about 800 feet AGL about 4.6nm before runway
By Simon Hradecky, created Thursday, Apr 2nd 2020 20:28Z, last updated Thursday, Apr 2nd 2020 20:41Z

An Asiana Airlines Boeing 747-400 freighter, registration HL7420 performing flight OZ-952 from Hanoi (Vietnam) to Hong Kong (China), performed an ILS approach to Hong Kong's runway 07R at about 06:25L (22:25Z Mar 31st), approach advised the crew to be aware of possible glideslope fluctuations due to an aircraft in the sensitive area. However, the aircraft descended to about 800 feet AGL about 4.6nm before the runway threshold. Tower instructed the flight to go around, the crew complied, climbed the aircraft to 5000 feet and positioned for a second approach to runway 07R, crossed 4.6nm before the threshold at about 1600 feet AGL and landed safely about 15 minutes after the go around.

Approach Control again told the next arrival to exercise caution due to glideslope fluctuations due to an aircraft in the sensitive area.
Aircraft in sensitive area 會導致 glideslope fluctuations?

replies.msg:
Descending through about 850 feet the aircraft began to turn right, deviated off the extended runway center line and initiated a go around at about 750 feet. The aircraft climbed on a heading of about 090 degrees (instead of 071 degrees), crossed the runway threshold 07R at about 2000 feet AGL and turned left onto a heading of about 059 degrees and climbed to 5000 feet being subsequently instructed to climb to 6000 feet.

750ft GA咗，climb with heading 090，cross 07R threshold at 2000ft，之後先發現再turn left返059

一路GA望住出邊少少唔對路就disconnect AP hand fly，你以為你飛緊Cessna? 喺度鳩吹有邊個唔叻？human factor就係human factor，眼前嘅嘢同自己expectation唔同就要時間反應，GA永遠都係先睇v speed後睇track，你咁唔滿意為寫信去民航局釘佢牌囉

quote.msg: 可能電腦錯
電腦錯嘅話機師唔識修正嘅？Deviate到去南跑先識轉返左，briefing 定go around 嗰時發夢呀？ 屌你撞山嘅話都唔係機師錯 係電腦錯 垃圾 CX

咁咪修正左囉，唔係你想點？飛150kt佢全程由北跑deviate到南跑做埋correction返北跑先30秒

嗌完GA比TOGA唔使時間？check FMA唔使時間？check positive rate唔使時間？到發覺對路諗一諗個appr briefing 再對一對而家個flight path 然後disconnect AP 或者紐MCP都要時間下話，你當機師機械人咩

replies.msg: 我真係好想問個差啲撞山係差咗幾多？1m? 10m? 事實上係佢只要有check vertical profile就算佢直飛埋座山度都撞唔到，由佢initiate go around 到3100ft clear個peak都唔使1分鐘。所以點解永遠GA都係check vertical profile先

咩態度 照你咁講我修正左之後架機差1mm就撞山都冇問題？唔係話唔比諗 但都唔係咁慢 仲要係主場，07L G/A maintain RWY HDG TIL 400’ and then track direct to DEDEE 要諗？？？
FLY THE AIRCRAFT 係首要 條 path冇理由 deviate 咁多 仲要咁係 APP同 G/A 依啲咁critical phases
G/A 比油同架機轉撚左去右邊有咩關係? 比緊油唔可以轉返去左邊修正? PF PM 都發緊夢? 後邊兩個食緊 sandwich?
ARRIVAL 之前已經做曬 briefing, 仲要係主場，唔理之前㩒錯咩掣都好，07 右邊成排山都照仲過去？主場喎 哈哈哈。 CHART 同 TERRAIN 已經 fail 啦。 WEATHER 咁撚大霧 ，係咪應該仲要留心小小架飛機條 path 呀？
同埋由佢轉右到南跑 未開始轉左修正，已經用左30秒時間 你自己計下數
你係咪嗰個機師呀 好驚冇左份工？
